WorkItem.Description:
My laptop keyboard or any other external keyboard  keys are not working in
this turbo c software while they are working on any other software like ms word,powerpoint. So pllease give me a solution onhow to repair this issue

Comments.Message: I have a similar issue; anyone has a solution? If so, please post it here. Thank you.

respected sir/mam
     
                          hello....thanks for such an great software. but from few days i m not able to work on it as such my keyboard key won't work on it..but before some months they were working correctly. kindly plz help me to overcome this problem.
